Articles.Content:
Hello to all,

I have been playing the game for more than a year on Macbook Pro. I have that 15" retina w/ GT750M discrete gpu. Like from the version 1.0.4, the game started to crash more often and nowadays it crashes on every few loading page. I play it on Steam, so checked the missing files if there are. Every time, it finds a few files to download. Then, nothing changes. It crashes again maybe on 3rd loading screen, or 4th. I mean, when I click on a building at KSC it may crash, if it doesn't, it crashes when I click on Launch button after I build a rocket.

The only mods I use is Kerbal Engineer Redux and Chatterer. Nothing else, and the things go worse every time I play. Also, I fear re-installing game because the last time I lost my saved games, although I saved them and then put in the game folder again. It just didn't work..

Hi ondert. I've moved this thread over to modded install support since you have mods installed. Could you please supply your Player.log so that the problem can be diagnosed? See instructions on the required information here: [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29[/url]

Hello,

Thanks. I've just uploaded the .log file. Here it is;

[URL]http://www.megafileupload.com/5y8d/Player.log.zip[/URL]
Hey!I figured out the problem 1.0.5 is crashing with few or with 0 mods because the new thermal system causes memory leak.
it will crash with no warning on start up like i never even started the game
